items.name: default-text-stagger-hover
items.title: Text Stagger Hover
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered effect triggered by hover gesture, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur), the stagger value, and the transition with default style.

items.name: shadcn-default-text-stagger-hover
items.title: Text Stagger Hover
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered effect triggered by hover gesture, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur), the stagger value, and the transition with shadcn-default style.

items.name: shadcn-new-york-text-stagger-hover
items.title: Text Stagger Hover
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered effect triggered by hover gesture, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur), the stagger value, and the transition with shadcn-new-york style.

items.name: default-text-stagger-inview
items.title: Text Stagger Inview
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered reveal triggered by view, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur) and the stagger value, and the transition with default style.

items.name: shadcn-default-text-stagger-inview
items.title: Text Stagger Inview
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered reveal triggered by view, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur) and the stagger value, and the transition with shadcn-default style.

items.title: Text Stagger Inview

items.name: default-text-vertical
items.title: Vertical Text
items.description: Text with vertical display, Can be used as a title or a subtitle with default style.

items.title: Vertical Text

items.title: Vertical Text

items.name: default-word-stagger
items.title: Word Stagger
items.description: Alternative to text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover, in case you have one word or you want more custom text animations, use this component, it is used in the same way as text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover with default style.

items.name: shadcn-default-word-stagger
items.title: Word Stagger
items.description: Alternative to text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover, in case you have one word or you want more custom text animations, use this component, it is used in the same way as text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover with shadcn-default style.

items.name: shadcn-new-york-word-stagger
items.title: Word Stagger
items.description: Alternative to text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover, in case you have one word or you want more custom text animations, use this component, it is used in the same way as text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover with shadcn-new-york style.

items.name: default-gsap-transitions
items.title: GSAP Transitions
items.description: GSAP custom easing functions, get the smooth gsap transitions withou using the whole library with default style.

items.title: set stagger direction
items.description: Set stagger direction, Allow to animate the stagger direction, from start, middle, end with default style.

items.name: default-split-text
items.title: split text
items.description: split text utility function, allows to split text into characters, words, returns (characters, words, characterCount, wordCount) with default style.

items.title: split text
items.description: split text utility function, allows to split text into characters, words, returns (characters, words, characterCount, wordCount) with shadcn-default style.

items.name: shadcn-new-york-split-text
items.title: split text
items.description: split text utility function, allows to split text into characters, words, returns (characters, words, characterCount, wordCount) with shadcn-new-york style.

items.name: default-use-animation-variants
items.title: Use Animation Variants
items.description: Use animation variants hook, for your motion components, allows to animate component with transforms, opacity, and blur with default style.
